1.text: Click at the inferior end of the left and right pelvic teardrop.
1.supp: These two points will be connected to form the teardrop line.

2.text: Click at the left and right end of the acetabular cup diameter.
2.supp: These two points will form the long axis of the ellipse tracing the acetabular cup perimeter.

3.text: Click on any point along the acetabular component superior perimeter that is visible to you.
3.supp: This point allows us to complete the ellipse around the acetabular cup head.

4.text: Click on the most superior point along the acetabular component inferior ellipse perimeter that is visible to you.
4.supp: This point allows us to complete the ellipse around the acetabular cup perimeter.

5.text: Click Choose File to annotate another image and download data.
5.supp: Annotate another image, or download data for the current image or all images annotated thus far. Data includes Abduction Angle, S/TL Ratio, and Anteversion Angle, which can be downloaded as a text or CSV file.
